name: Selepe Sello
description: I am a highly motivated Computer Sciences graduate with a strong focus on end-product delivery, ranked among the most active GitHub contributors in South Africa, with a proven ability to build secure, scalable, high-performance and innovative solutions in Software Engineering, and Cloud Development. I achieved over 2.6K commits and 1.6K pull requests across 50+ open-source projects, demonstrating my dedication to collaborative development and continuous learning. My proficiency spans 12+ programming languages, enabling versatile cross-domain solutions.

education.details: Earned distinction in Software Engineering, demonstrating advanced proficiency in software design, agile methodologies, and CI/CD practices. Built and deployed 15+ live projects on GitHub across multiple modules with comprehensive documentation and live demos. Competed in hackathons including Nemisa 2023 Data Science Datathon, created Capture The Flag cybersecurity challenges, and mentored students through the STARS Mentorship Programme.

Completed intensive bootcamp focusing on modern web technologies and industry-standard development methodologies. Enhanced skills in building robust, scalable web applications with emphasis on responsive design, performance optimization, and comprehensive unit testing. Strengthened capabilities in advanced coding techniques, debugging strategies, and modern JavaScript frameworks while advancing effective learning methodologies.

Completed Cloud Development Nanodegree 3 weeks early while managing university studies, ranking among top four participants. Built production-ready applications with microservices architecture, serverless framework, and RESTful APIs using AWS S3 and PostgreSQL. Deployed applications using Docker Containers and Kubernetes Clusters, leveraging AWS services including Lambda, API Gateway, EC2, and CloudFormation.

experience.details: Developed 7+ scalable applications using TypeScript, Next.js/React, Python, FastAPI, and Node.js, maintaining seamless functionality for 9,500 concurrent users. Led automated CI/CD pipeline integration achieving 15% faster release cycles across 6 projects through GitHub Actions. Optimized cloud infrastructure achieving 99.5% uptime through DevOps practices and implemented secure architecture with JWT Auth and real-time WebSocket communication.

experience.position: Web Developer Intern, GAO TEK Inc
experience.details: Built 3 interactive WooCommerce platforms boosting customer engagement through optimized user interfaces and custom WordPress plugins using PHP, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Engineered high-performance back-end solutions accelerating product filtering and AJAX search capabilities, seamlessly handling 1,500+ daily users with zero downtime while implementing responsive design principles.

Supported over 500 students and 5 administrators ensuring 95% availability of computer labs through proactive monitoring and rapid issue resolution. Executed 50+ hardware/software installations and conducted 15+ live casting setups with no delays, implementing efficient workflow processes and maintaining detailed documentation for enhanced productivity.
